00025         VideoFormats::VideoFormats(void)
00026         {
00027                 setClassID(UOSUTIL_RTTI_VIDEO_FORMATS);
00028         }

00030         VideoFormats::~VideoFormats(void)
00031         {
00032                 // nothing to do
00033         }
00034 
00035         int32 VideoFormats::init(uint32 hsize)
00036         {
00037                 int32 tsz = 0, ret = 0;
00038 
00039                 struct vf_itm {
00040                         item itm;
00041                         char* vfstring;
00042                 };
00043 
00044                 struct vf_itm itms[] = {
00045                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,      VF_UNDEF, 32 },     "VF_UNDEF" },
00046                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,   VF_RGB24, 24 },         "VF_RGB24" },
00047                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_RGBA, 32 },          "VF_RGBA" },
00048                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,   VF_RGB32, 32 },         "VF_RGB32" },
00049                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,  VF_RGB16_565, 16 }, "VF_RGB16_565" },
00050                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,  VF_RGB16_555, 16 }, "VF_RGB16_555" },
00051                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_UYVY, 16 },          "VF_UYUV" },
00052                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_IYU1, 12 },          "VF_IYU1" },
00053                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_IYU2, 24 },          "VF_IYU2" },
00054                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_YV12, 12 },          "VF_YV12" },
00055                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_NV12, 12 },          "VF_NV12" },
00056                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,     VF_YUV420, 12 },    "VF_YUV420" },
00057                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,   VF_YUV422, 16 },        "VF_YUV422" },
00058                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_YUYV, 16 },          "VF_YUYV" },
00059                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,     VF_YUV411, 16 },    "VF_YUV411" },
00060                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,            VF_RAW, 32 },           "VF_RAW" },
00061                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,    VF_YUV422P, 16 },   "VF_YUV422P" },
00062                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,    VF_YUV411P, 16 },   "VF_YUV411P" },
00063                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_GREY,  8 },          "VF_GREY" },
00064                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_IYUV, 12 },          "VF_IYUV" },
00065                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_YUY2, 16 },          "VF_YUY2" },
00066                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_YVYU, 16 },          "VF_YVYU" },
00067                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_I420, 12 },          "VF_I420" },
00068                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_YVU9, 36 },          "VF_YVU9" },
00069                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,   VF_BGR24, 24 },         "VF_BGR24" },
00070                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_BGRA, 32 },          "VF_BGRA" },
00071                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,   VF_BGR32, 32 },         "VF_BGR32" },
00072                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_ARGB, 32 },          "VF_ARGB" },
00073                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,     VF_YUV410, 16 },    "VF_YUV410" },
00074                         {{ VIDEOFORMAT, 0, 0,           VF_ABGR, 32 },          "VF_ABGR" }
00075                 };
00076 
00077                 ret = SharedHash::init(hsize);
00078                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00079                         return FAILURE;
00080 
00081                 tsz = sizeof(itms) / sizeof(vf_itm);
00082                 for (int32 i = 0; i < tsz; i++) {
00083                         put(itms[i].vfstring, (char *) &itms[i].itm, sizeof(itms[i].itm));
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 return SUCCESS;
00087         }
00088 
00089         void VideoFormats::build(int32 what, int16 min_w, int16 min_h,
00090                 int16 max_w, int16 max_h)
00091         {
00092                 int32 i = 0;
00093                 int32 max_rv_idx = 26, max_rd_idx = 8;
00094                 char tmp[4096];
00095 
00096                 item r_v[] = {
00097                         { RESOLUTION,    1,    1, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  0
00098                         { RESOLUTION,   32,   24, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  1
00099                         { RESOLUTION,   64,   48, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  2
00100                         { RESOLUTION,   80,   60, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  3
00101                         { RESOLUTION,  128,   96, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  4
00102                         { RESOLUTION,  160,  100, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  5
00103                         { RESOLUTION,  160,  120, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  6
00104                         { RESOLUTION,  176,  144, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  7
00105                         { RESOLUTION,  192,  144, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  8
00106                         { RESOLUTION,  300,  185, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, //  9
00107                         { RESOLUTION,  320,  200, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 10
00108                         { RESOLUTION,  320,  240, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 11
00109                         { RESOLUTION,  352,  288, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 12
00110                         { RESOLUTION,  384,  288, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 13
00111                         { RESOLUTION,  352,  480, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 14
00112                         { RESOLUTION,  352,  576, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 15
00113                         { RESOLUTION,  480,  576, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 16
00114                         { RESOLUTION,  640,  262, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 17
00115                         { RESOLUTION,  640,  480, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 18
00116                         { RESOLUTION,  704,  576, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 19
00117                         { RESOLUTION,  720,  480, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 20
00118                         { RESOLUTION,  720,  576, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 21
00119                         { RESOLUTION,  800,  600, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 22
00120                         { RESOLUTION, 1152,  864, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 23
00121                         { RESOLUTION, 1408, 1152, VF_UNDEF, 0 }, // 24
00122                         { RESOLUTION, 1920, 1080, VF_UNDEF, 0 }  // 25
00123 
00124                 };
00125 
00126                 item r_d[] = {
00127                         { RESOLUTION,  320, 200, VF_UNDEF, 0 },
00128                         { RESOLUTION,  640, 480, VF_UNDEF, 0 },
00129                         { RESOLUTION,  800, 600, VF_UNDEF, 0 },
00130                         { RESOLUTION, 1024, 768, VF_UNDEF, 0 },
00131                         { RESOLUTION, 1152, 864, VF_UNDEF, 0 },
00132                         { RESOLUTION, 1280,1024, VF_UNDEF, 0 },
00133                         { RESOLUTION, 1400,1050, VF_UNDEF, 0 },
00134                         { RESOLUTION, 1600,1280, VF_UNDEF, 0 }
00135                 };
00136 
00137                 switch (what) {
00138                 case RES_VIDEO:
00139                         for (i = 0; i < max_rv_idx; i++) {
00140                                 if ((r_v[i].w >= min_w || r_v[i].h >= min_h) &&
00141                                         (r_v[i].w <= max_w || r_v[i].h <= max_h)) {
00142                                         snprintf(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "%dx%d", r_v[i].w, r_v[i].h);
00143                                         put(tmp, (char *) &r_v[i], sizeof(item));
00144                                 }
00145                         }
00146                         break;
00147                 case RES_DISPLAY:
00148                         for (i = 0; i < max_rd_idx; i++) {
00149                                 if ((r_d[i].w >= min_w || r_d[i].h >= min_h) &&
00150                                         (r_d[i].w <= max_w || r_d[i].h <= max_h)) {
00151                                         snprintf(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "%dx%d", r_d[i].w, r_d[i].h);
00152                                         put(tmp, (char *) &r_d[i], sizeof(item));
00153                                 }
00154                         }
00155                 }
00156         }
00157 
00158         void VideoFormats::fillVectorWithResolutions(Vector* v)
00159         {
00160                 Enumeration* en = keys();
00161                 while (en->hasMoreElements()) {
00162                         char* key = (char*) en->nextElement();
00163                         item* itm = (item*) get(key);
00164 
00165                         if (itm->type == RESOLUTION)
00166                                 v->addElement(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1);
00167                 }
00168         }
00169 
00170         void VideoFormats::fillVectorWithFormats(Vector* v)
00171         {
00172                 Enumeration* en = keys();
00173                 while (en->hasMoreElements()) {
00174                         char* key = (char*) en->nextElement();
00175                         item* itm = (item*) get(key);
00176 
00177                         if (itm->type == VIDEOFORMAT)
00178                                 v->addElement(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1);
00179                 }
00180         }

00182         uint32 VideoFormats::computeImageSize(VideoFormat vf, int16 w, int16 h)
00183         {
00184                 switch (vf) {
00185                 case VF_UNDEF:
00186                         return w * h * 4;     // use RGB32 by default
00187                 case VF_RGB24:
00188                         return w * h * 3;
00189                 case VF_RGBA:
00190                         return w * h * 4;
00191                 case VF_RGB32:
00192                         return w * h * 4;
00193                 case VF_RGB16_565:
00194                         return w * h * 2;
00195                 case VF_RGB16_555:
00196                         return w * h * 2;
00197                 case VF_UYVY:
00198                         return w * h * 2;     // as YUV422
00199                 case VF_IYU1:
00200                         return w * h * 3 / 2;
00201                 case VF_IYU2:
00202                         return w * h * 3;
00203                 case VF_YV12:
00204                         return w * h * 3 / 2; // as YUV420
00205                 case VF_NV12:
00206                         return w * h * 3 / 2; // as YUV420
00207                 case VF_YUV420:
00208                         return w * h * 3 / 2;
00209                 case VF_YUV422:
00210                         return w * h * 2;
00211                 case VF_YUYV:
00212                         return w * h * 2;     // as YUV422
00213                 case VF_YUV411:
00214                         return w * h * 2;     // uncertain
00215                 case VF_RAW:
00216                         return w * h * 4;     // use RGB32 by default
00217                 case VF_YUV422P:
00218                         return w * h * 2;     // as YUV422
00219                 case VF_YUV411P:
00220                         return w * h * 2;
00221                 case VF_GREY:
00222                         return w * h;
00223                 case VF_IYUV:
00224                         return w * h * 3 / 2; // as YUV420
00225                 case VF_YUY2:
00226                         return w * h * 2;     // as YUV422
00227                 case VF_YVYU:
00228                         return w * h * 2;     // as YUV422
00229                 case VF_I420:
00230                         return w * h * 3 / 2; // as YUV420
00231                 case VF_YVU9:
00232                         return w * h * 9 / 8; // uncertain
00233                 case VF_BGR24:
00234                         return w * h * 3;
00235                 case VF_BGRA:
00236                         return w * h * 4;
00237                 case VF_BGR32:
00238                         return w * h * 4;
00239                 case VF_ARGB:
00240                         return w * h * 4;
00241                 case VF_YUV410:
00242                         return w * h * 2; // uncertain
00243                 case VF_ABGR:
00244                         return w * h * 4;
00245                 }
00246 
00247                 return 0;
00248         }
00249 
00250         uint8 VideoFormats::getDepth(VideoFormat vf)
00251         {
00252                 switch (vf) {
00253                 case VF_UNDEF:
00254                         return 32; // use RGB32 by default
00255                 case VF_RGB24:
00256                         return 24;
00257                 case VF_RGBA:
00258                         return 32;
00259                 case VF_RGB32:
00260                         return 32;
00261                 case VF_RGB16_565:
00262                         return 16;
00263                 case VF_RGB16_555:
00264                         return 16;
00265                 case VF_UYVY:
00266                         return 16;
00267                 case VF_IYU1:
00268                         return 12;
00269                 case VF_IYU2:
00270                         return 24;
00271                 case VF_YV12:
00272                         return 12;
00273                 case VF_NV12:
00274                         return 12;
00275                 case VF_YUV420:
00276                         return 12;
00277                 case VF_YUV422:
00278                         return 16;
00279                 case VF_YUYV:
00280                         return 16;
00281                 case VF_YUV411:
00282                         return 16; // uncertain
00283                 case VF_RAW:
00284                         return 32; // use RGB32 by default
00285                 case VF_YUV422P:
00286                         return 16;
00287                 case VF_YUV411P:
00288                         return 16;
00289                 case VF_GREY:
00290                         return  8;
00291                 case VF_IYUV:
00292                         return 12; // as I420
00293                 case VF_YUY2:
00294                         return 16;
00295                 case VF_YVYU:
00296                         return 16;
00297                 case VF_I420:
00298                         return 12;
00299                 case VF_YVU9:
00300                         return 36; // uncertain
00301                 case VF_BGR24:
00302                         return 24;
00303                 case VF_BGRA:
00304                         return 32;
00305                 case VF_BGR32:
00306                         return 32;
00307                 case VF_ARGB:
00308                         return 32;
00309                 case VF_YUV410:
00310                         return 16; // uncertain
00311                 case VF_ABGR:
00312                         return 32;
00313                 }
00314 
00315                 return 0;
00316         }

00318         uint32 VideoFormats::computeFourCC(VideoFormat vf)
00319         {
00320                 /*
00321                   * These fourcc codes must be checked against official
00322                   * ones. They are not all correct.
00323                   */
00324 
00325                 switch (vf) {
00326                 case VF_UNDEF:
00327                         return 0;
00328                 case VF_RGB24:
00329                         return MAKEFOURCC('R', 'G', 'B', ' ');
00330                 case VF_RGBA:
00331                         return MAKEFOURCC('R', 'G', 'B', 'A');
00332                 case VF_RGB32:
00333                         return MAKEFOURCC('R', 'G', 'B', 'A');
00334                 case VF_RGB16_565:
00335                         return MAKEFOURCC('R', 'G', 'B', '2');
00336                 case VF_RGB16_555:
00337                         return MAKEFOURCC('R', 'G', 'B', '2');
00338                 case VF_UYVY:
00339                         return MAKEFOURCC('U', 'Y', 'V', 'Y');
00340                 case VF_IYU1:
00341                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', 'Y', 'U', '1');
00342                 case VF_IYU2:
00343                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', 'Y', 'U', '2');
00344                 case VF_YV12:
00345                         return MAKEFOURCC('Y', 'V', '1', '2');
00346                 case VF_NV12:
00347                         return MAKEFOURCC('N', 'V', '1', '2');
00348                 case VF_YUV420:
00349                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', '4', '2', '0');
00350                 case VF_YUV422:
00351                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', '4', '2', '2');
00352                 case VF_YUYV:
00353                         return MAKEFOURCC('Y', 'U', 'Y', 'V');
00354                 case VF_YUV411:
00355                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', '4', '1', '1');
00356                 case VF_RAW:
00357                         return MAKEFOURCC('R', 'A', 'W', ' ');
00358                 case VF_YUV422P:
00359                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', '4', '2', '2');
00360                 case VF_YUV411P:
00361                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', '4', '1', '1');
00362                 case VF_GREY:
00363                         return MAKEFOURCC('G', 'R', 'E', 'Y');
00364                 case VF_IYUV:
00365                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', 'Y', 'U', 'V');
00366                 case VF_YUY2:
00367                         return MAKEFOURCC('Y', 'U', 'Y', '2');
00368                 case VF_YVYU:
00369                         return MAKEFOURCC('Y', 'V', 'Y', 'U');
00370                 case VF_I420:
00371                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', '4', '2', '0');
00372                 case VF_YVU9:
00373                         return MAKEFOURCC('Y', 'V', 'U', '9');
00374                 case VF_BGR24:
00375                         return MAKEFOURCC('B', 'G', 'R', ' ');
00376                 case VF_BGRA:
00377                         return MAKEFOURCC('B', 'G', 'R', 'A');
00378                 case VF_BGR32:
00379                         return MAKEFOURCC('B', 'G', 'R', 'A');
00380                 case VF_ARGB:
00381                         return MAKEFOURCC('A', 'R', 'G', 'B');
00382                 case VF_YUV410:
00383                         return MAKEFOURCC('I', '4', '1', '0');
00384                 case VF_ABGR:
00385                         return MAKEFOURCC('A', 'B', 'G', 'R');
00386                 }
00387 
00388                 return 0;
00389         }

00391         char* VideoFormats::getVideoFormatString(VideoFormat vf)
00392         {
00393                 switch (vf) {
00394                 case VF_UNDEF:
00395                         return "VF_UNDEF";
00396                 case VF_RGB24:
00397                         return "VF_RGB24";
00398                 case VF_RGBA:
00399                         return "VF_RGBA";
00400                 case VF_RGB32:
00401                         return "VF_RGB32";
00402                 case VF_RGB16_565:
00403                         return "VF_RGB16_565";
00404                 case VF_RGB16_555:
00405                         return "VF_RGB16_555";
00406                 case VF_UYVY:
00407                         return "VF_UYUV";
00408                 case VF_IYU1:
00409                         return "VF_IYU1";
00410                 case VF_IYU2:
00411                         return "VF_IYU2";
00412                 case VF_YV12:
00413                         return "VF_YV12";
00414                 case VF_NV12:
00415                         return "VF_NV12";
00416                 case VF_YUV420:
00417                         return "VF_YUV420";
00418                 case VF_YUV422:
00419                         return "VF_YUV422";
00420                 case VF_YUYV:
00421                         return "VF_YUYV";
00422                 case VF_YUV411:
00423                         return "VF_YUV411";
00424                 case VF_RAW:
00425                         return "VF_RAW";
00426                 case VF_YUV422P:
00427                         return "VF_YUV422P";
00428                 case VF_YUV411P:
00429                         return "VF_YUV411P";
00430                 case VF_GREY:
00431                         return "VF_GREY";
00432                 case VF_IYUV:
00433                         return "VF_IYUV";
00434                 case VF_YUY2:
00435                         return "VF_YUY2";
00436                 case VF_YVYU:
00437                         return "VF_YVYU";
00438                 case VF_I420:
00439                         return "VF_I420";
00440                 case VF_YVU9:
00441                         return "VF_YVU9";
00442                 case VF_BGR24:
00443                         return "VF_BGR24";
00444                 case VF_BGRA:
00445                         return "VF_BGRA";
00446                 case VF_BGR32:
00447                         return "VF_BGR32";
00448                 case VF_ARGB:
00449                         return "VF_ARGB";
00450                 case VF_YUV410:
00451                         return "VF_YUV410";
00452                 case VF_ABGR:
00453                         return "VF_ABGR";
00454                 }
00455 
00456                 return "UNDEFINED";
00457         }
